title: Learning Design and Language Education Expert Development Through International Virtual Internships

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced knowledge in learning theories, instructional design principles, and language education
context.additional_context: Virtual Internship Program for Adult Learners Unable to Participate in Physical Internships Due to Work and Family Obligations: Project-Based Learning Environment to Strengthen Language Domain Expertise

learning_goals: Learners can independently plan and execute learning design projects in international virtual internship environments
Learners can collaborate with multicultural team members to develop and evaluate language education materials
Learners can demonstrate the competency to design learning solutions reflecting actual corporate needs through project deliverables

resources: Online collaboration tools (MS Teams, Zoom, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
